name: Click to Continue
description:
The game is ending. Click to continue. An experiment made for Ludum Dare 50.

Press F11 for fullscreen. May not scale properly on some monitors.

Content warning: This game may contain mild language, mild violence, and themes that some will find disturbing. In this game as well as all others, some times quitting is the right choice. Please don't take anything in this experience too seriously and treat everyone you meet with love and compassion.

Credits

  • “Rock breaking” sound effect by Blender Foundation
  • “Children’s March” song by Cleyton Kauffman - soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman
  • “William Kentridge” song by Patricia Taxxon - patriciataxxon.bandcamp.com
